current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend expiring
		  authority for work-study allowances for individuals who are pursuing programs
		  of rehabilitation, education, or training under laws administered by the
		  Secretary of Veterans Affairs, to expand such authority to certain outreach
		  services provided through congressional offices, and for other
		  purposes.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

header.#text:
Extension and expansion of
			 authority for certain qualifying work-study activities for purposes of the
			 educational assistance programs of the Department of Veterans Affairs

quote.#tail:
each place it
			 appears and inserting

text.#text:
Such section is further amended by adding
			 at the end the following new subparagraph:

header.#text:
Expansion to
			 outreach services provided through congressional offices

text.#text:
During the period beginning on June 30,

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S894 IS: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend expiring authority for work-study allowances for individuals who are pursuing programs of rehabilitation, education, or training under laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, to expand such authority to certain outreach services provided through congressional offices, and for other purposes.
